text: 5.27 2 Ko 11.2, Epe 1.4, Kol 1.22 Gos ne anɨgɨl mɨdeb, binɨb ne okok kɨlop gek, kɨli bin teplep olap tek yenɨgabal. Gach sek ma mɨdɨl, aŋoy sɨlek soy mɨdup ma mɨdɨl, tap tɨmel anɨb okok ma yɨbɨl yenɨgabal.5.27 Anɨb ak takaw paladaŋ lɨl agak. Chɨn Klays binɨb ne okok, bin teplep yɨbɨl mɨdobun tek, Klays chɨnop dɨnɨgab. Yad nɨgen kɨli teplep yɨbɨl mɨdɨl binɨb suŋtep takaw ma mɨdeb mɨdel kɨlop dad amnɨgayn agɨl, ne kɨlop nen monmon kumak.
